name: Panic Button
description:
• This game requires at least 2 players to play.
  • Each player can click as many time the red Panic Button as their want, but be aware that the bomb will be trigger at any moment.
  • After done clicking the red Panic Button, the current player need to pass the phone to other player so that each player can have their turn to click the red Panic Button.
  • Repeat until the bomb triggered.

Note: Detail tutorial can be found inside the game.
